nodes.text: Kriekaal was a planet in the Kriekaal system, and the homeworld of the Krieks. Its continents were composed of hardened duranium and its shallow oceans of molten duranium.
In 2,000,000 BBY, an alien named Ssiskor came to Kriekaal, but perished in a catastrophe wrapped in legend of supernatural forces, which claim the oceans themselves destroyed him.
New continents were constantly forming on the planet. The continent Raltez finished its formation only by 3 ABY. The planet was later rediscovered by the New Republic.
